body:
Comment 3: 
AFAIK, cygwin was never supported by Go. Please retry in your OS an equivalent (via cmd
I guess) of :

jnml@r630 ~/tmp $ ls -la
celkem 8
drwxr-xr-x  2 jnml jnml 4096 říj 19 16:01 .
drwxr-xr-x 36 jnml jnml 4096 říj 19 16:01 ..
jnml@r630 ~/tmp $ touch bad.y
jnml@r630 ~/tmp $ go tool yacc bad.y 
unexpected EOF before %: bad.y:1
jnml@r630 ~/tmp $
